#IIScOpenDay. Chemical Sensing, Wavelength Conversion, Self-cleaning Surfaces, Nucleation demo, Dye Sensitized Solar Cell, and more.
#IIScOpenDay. Human brain demo, Virus models, Real time shows of X-ray diffraction from protein crystals, Nature walks, and more.

It's great that this year's #IIScOpenDay shares this special bond with Sir C.V. Raman, the first Indian Director of IISc (1933-37)!
#IIScOpenDay is an annual event held around the 28th of Feb, India's National Science Day, commemorating Raman's Nobel-winning discovery.
